summary: Small player house built inside a ship. Can be taken to Windhelm, Solitude and Dawnstar. Only vanilla Skyrim required. Plenty of storage and display space. Cozy and unique interiors.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/3sAABwI.png[/img]

[b][color=#ff7700][b][color=#e69138][b][color=#daa520][size=6]THE DLC ADDON IS NOW AVAILABLE !![/size][/color]
[color=#ff8c00][size=4]It requires all DLC [/size][size=5]and [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56084/]SeaPoint Settlement[/url][/b][/size][size=4]. It will allow you to go to 4 new locations: SeaPoint, Castle Volkihar, Raven Rock and Tel Thirith (new world space). See the images section's last pages for new images!

[/size][/color][/b][/color][/b][/color][/b][color=#cc4125][b][b][size=5]Mod works as intended, so don't expect any updates.[/size][/b][/b][b]
[size=4]I don't develop old mods any more.
[/size][/b][/color]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/elianorapwnsu][img]http://i.imgur.com/267fYFk.png[/img][/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/c/Elianora][img]http://i.imgur.com/bGTVC9s.png[/img][/url]
_________________________________________________________________ 

Creator: Elianora
Script work: Leianne

[b][color=#e69138][size=4]:: REQUIREMENTS ::
[/size][/color][/b]- Skyrim.esm

DLC addon: 
Dawnguard.esm
Hearthfires.esm
Dragonborn.esm
SeaPointSettlement.esp

[b][color=#f6b26b][size=4]:: COMPATIBILITY ::[/size][/color][/b]
• Expanded Towns and Cities
• Mörskom Estate
• Balanced Magic mod causes Alteration issue with the Waterbreathing blessing from the Tava shrine

[b][color=#e69138][size=4]:: FEATURES ::
[/size][/color][/b]• Three sailing locations: Solitude, Windhelm, Dawnstar
• Most vanilla crafting (no smelter & wood chopping block)
• Two mannequins, plenty of static weapon plaques
• Crap ton of unique clutter and decorations
• Custom shrine
• Unique weapon
• When purchased, house shows up in "houses owned",
so it will count towards your stats

[img]http://i.imgur.com/lWtn1rd.gif[/img]
[color=#ff7700][b][size=4]
:: GENERAL ::
[/size][/b][/color]I made this place for myself, so it has what I need for an enjoyable playthrough. That means no glitching weapon plaques that eat weapons. I made them static because I am a massive fan of[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52583/?] Jaxonz Positioner[/url][/b] mod that gives me the freedom to decorate my homes. There is also an empty display cabinet that you can use for whatever treasures you want to display. I don't like to predetermine what people can put up on their walls and what not. Some storage inside the home are already renamed, some are left as they are. I also use[b] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57335/?]Jaxonz Renamer[/url] [/b]to aid my OCD and to rename all the containers to reflect what I've stored in them. Neat freaks of the world, UNITE!

I have left myself some storage on the deck. The ship doesn't actually "sail". It's like a TARDIS, it just appears in another location. No time passes so you don't die of hunger or thirst while sailing. The deck storage work as a cloud, so when you're in Dawnstar or Windhelm, you don't get the storage animations, but you are still utilising the same storage.

[b][color=#f6b26b][size=4]:: I AIM TO MISBEHAVE (how the ship works) ::
[/size][/color][/b]Serenity can be found under Solitude arch. You can go aboard it, but you cannot get in the cabin or sail it. There's a for sale sign near the dock, and you can activate it to call the courier to get the money from you. When you start approaching Solitude gate the courier should find you. If you activate the sign and try to buy the ship without having sufficient funds (10,000 septims), it will not allow you to purchase the ship.
Once you have talked to the courier, read the deed he gave you, your key is stored between the pages of the book.

You are now able to use the ship's wheel to take you to a few towns. 

[img]http://i.imgur.com/J87QEaq.gif[/img][b][color=#e69138][size=4]

:: RECOMMENDED MODS ::

[/size][/color][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56084/]SeaPoint Settlement: [/url] [/size][/b]
A wonderful little hamlet in the north coast, buzzing with life and commerce.
Serenity can travel there, and the village has a player home as well as shops, a tavern and stables.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/WNktICG.png[/img]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26269/?]Langley's textures
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52583/?] Jaxonz Positioner[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57335/]Jaxonz Renamer[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51467/?]Skyrim Mod Combiner[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53442/]zzjay's wardrobe for pirate clothes[/url]

[color=#ff7700][b][size=4]:: PERMISSIONS ::[/size][/b]
[/color]This file contains resources and assets that belong to other authors and you can't use them without the consent of the original creators.

For modder's resources, find the original upload and go give a download to the resource providers. Don't use my bsa as a warehouse for resources!

[i][color=#cc4125]I welcome translations of the file as long as it's uploaded exclusively on the original mod's page. As I do not own the rights to
some of the assets, this mod CANNOT BE HOSTED OUTSIDE NEXUS.[/color][/i]
[i]
Vindsvept music is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.
In short, you can use it in any way you want as long as you leave a link back to the original source.

http://vindsvept.com/ and https://www.youtube.com/user/Vindsvept
[/i]
[color=#f6b26b][b][size=4]:: CREDITS ::[/size][/b]
[/color]See Perms tab

[color=#e69138][size=4][b]:: THANKS ::[/b][/size][/color]
Leianne for superb help, without her this mod not would be nearly as awesome as it is.
Jaden for beta testing and breaking the purchase quest >:)
 ShadowWhisper for testing

[b][color=#e69138][size=5]:: THE RETURN OF THE WORLD RENOWNED FAQ ::
[/size][/color][/b]
Q: The courier took mah monieseptims but I CAN'T SAIL THE SHIP!!11
A: Read the deed that gets put in your inventory, gorram.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/reRej9N.gif[/img]

Q: I DON'T LIKE THE LOCATIONS! SAIL TO MOON! SAIL TO SOLSTHEIM! MAKE IT FLY!
A: I wanted to make something for the non-DLC users. There may be a DLC version later that sails there. Meanwhile you can get [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57141/?[b]]Mörskom Estate[/url][/b] which has more versatile sailing options for its fishing boat

Q: LOCATION CLASHES WITH BIG BOOBY BROTHEL MOD WITH HALF A MILLION USERS!!11 MOVE IT!!
A: [img]http://i.imgur.com/SWMMrrT.gif[/img]

Q: MAKE A PATCH FOR MOD X !!
A: Sorry, I tried patching a few mods but it turned into a hot mess. You just need to decide which mod you want the most :P
Also:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/hqZi8tA.gif[/img]

Q: YOU'RE MAKING TOO MANY MODS! GET A LIFE!!11 STAPH!111
A: [img]http://i.imgur.com/djBSqKw.gif[/img] 

Q: YOU JUST CAN'T GET THE HOUSE ACQUIREMENT RIGHT! I DON'T WANT TO PAY! MAKE A QUEST! YOUR STUPID! I WANT IT FOR FREE! BEESH!
A: [img]http://i.imgur.com/Wf5MN1N.gif[/img]

Q: AWESOME MOD! I love you!!11
A: [img]http://i.imgur.com/uQwtCrQ.gif[/img]

Q: I get upset over trivial, dumb little crap, so these gifs are annoying me and you made me cry. SOMEONE LIKES SOMETHING THAT I DO NOT LIKE!!
Make it stop! Please stop! YOUR A TUMBLR IDIOT!
A: [img]http://i.imgur.com/dUHq06Z.gif[/img] [/center]
author: Elianora - Leianne
